name: Cosmic Seer
description: Fateweavers who observe the grand tapestry of fate with detachment, seeking perfect knowledge of all possible futures and maintaining the balance of destiny.

resource_systems.name: Mana
resource_systems.description: Mystical energy that powers divination spells and prophecies
resource_systems.regeneration: 3 per 6 seconds, +5 when successfully predicting an event
mechanics: Mana points are spent to cast divination spells and invoke prophecies
Some abilities require maintaining a connection to the future, consuming mana over time
Meditation increases mana regeneration rate by 500% but prevents movement
Can channel mana into complex divination rituals that reveal cosmic truths

resource_systems.name: Fate Points
resource_systems.description: Accumulated knowledge of possible futures that can be spent to alter destiny
resource_systems.regeneration: 3 per long rest, additional points gained through significant divinations
mechanics: Fate Points can be spent to reroll dice for self or allies
Can be used to force a critical success or failure on a single action
Powerful destiny-altering abilities consume multiple Fate Points
Can be invested in maintaining cosmic balance and order

resource_systems.name: Destiny Threads
resource_systems.description: Tangible manifestations of fate that can be manipulated to create powerful effects
resource_systems.regeneration: 2 per hour, additional threads gained when significant events align with predictions
mechanics: Threads can be woven into patterns that create various magical effects
Can be attached to individuals to observe their destiny without interference
More complex patterns require more threads but produce more powerful effects
Threads can be used to maintain balance between opposing forces

resource_systems.name: Cosmic Awareness
resource_systems.description: Expanded consciousness that perceives the underlying patterns of reality
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when observing significant events or maintaining cosmic balance
mechanics: Increases by 10 when witnessing a major event unfold as predicted
Increases by 20 when successfully maintaining balance between opposing forces
Decreases by 5 per hour when actively manipulating fate
Can be spent to gain momentary omniscience or create powerful reality-altering effects

class_mechanics.name: Perfect Observation
class_mechanics.description: The ability to perceive all aspects of reality with perfect clarity
effects: Can perceive all possible futures stemming from a single moment
Immune to all forms of illusion and deception
Can observe events occurring anywhere in the world
Perception extends to other planes of existence

class_mechanics.name: Balance Keeper
class_mechanics.description: Maintenance of cosmic equilibrium between opposing forces
effects: Can detect imbalances in the fabric of reality
Able to counter extreme destiny manipulations by others
Presence naturally stabilizes volatile magical effects
Can temporarily neutralize powerful beings who threaten cosmic balance

class_mechanics.name: Fate Neutrality
class_mechanics.description: Perfect detachment from personal desires when manipulating destiny
effects: Immune to emotional manipulation and mind control
Fate manipulations are undetectable by other seers
Can observe multiple timelines simultaneously without confusion
Actions never create paradoxes or temporal instabilities

class_mechanics.name: Cosmic Understanding
class_mechanics.description: Comprehension of the fundamental laws that govern reality
effects: Can identify the critical nexus points in any sequence of events
Understands the true names and nature of all beings
Can predict the exact consequences of any action
Perceives the underlying mathematical patterns of the universe

signature_abilities.name: Moment of Omniscience
signature_abilities.description: Achieve perfect knowledge of all things for a brief moment
mechanics: For 10 seconds, gain complete knowledge of all events past, present, and future
Can ask up to 3 questions about any subject and receive absolutely true answers
Perceive the complete destiny of any individual or object
Gain perfect tactical knowledge of any situation
Costs 70 Mana, 4 Fate Points, and 50 Cosmic Awareness

signature_abilities.name: Reality Stabilization
signature_abilities.description: Create a zone where fate cannot be manipulated and reality follows its natural course
mechanics: Establishes a 100-meter radius zone that lasts for 1 hour
Within the zone, all fate manipulation abilities are neutralized
Time flows at its natural rate, preventing temporal manipulation
All beings within are protected from external destiny interference
Costs 60 Mana, 3 Fate Points, and 40 Cosmic Awareness

signature_abilities.name: Cosmic Rebalancing
signature_abilities.description: Correct a major imbalance in the fabric of reality
mechanics: Can completely neutralize a catastrophic magical event
Restore natural order to an area affected by extreme chaos or law
Force powerful entities back to their native planes
Repair damage to the fabric of reality itself
Costs 100 Mana, 7 Fate Points, and 100 Cosmic Awareness

skill_trees.name: Path of the Observer
key_abilities: All-Seeing Eye: Perceive events occurring anywhere in the multiverse
Timeline Perception: View all possible futures stemming from a single moment
Truth Discernment: Automatically know if any statement is true or false

skill_trees.name: Path of the Arbiter
key_abilities: Neutrality Field: Create an area where all extremes are moderated
Cosmic Judgment: Assess any being or action against universal law
Balance Restoration: Return any system to its natural equilibrium

skill_trees.name: Path of the Cosmic Mind
skill_trees.focus: Understanding and manipulating the fundamental laws of reality
key_abilities: Universal Language: Communicate with any being regardless of language or form
Law Manipulation: Temporarily alter a fundamental law of physics in a small area
Pattern Recognition: Instantly understand the underlying structure of any system

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 15 points in the Master Seer skill tree
advancement_requirements.alignment: Must maintain Neutral alignment for at least 10 levels
challenges: Maintain perfect neutrality during a major conflict
Successfully predict the outcome of 10 significant events

legendary_items.name: Monocle of Infinite Sight
effects: Intelligence increased by 5
Can see through all physical and magical barriers
Moment of Omniscience duration increased to 30 seconds

legendary_items.name: Scales of Cosmic Balance
effects: Reality Stabilization radius increased by 50 meters
Automatically warns of impending cosmic imbalances
Grants immunity to chaos and law manipulation effects

legendary_items.name: Robes of the Eternal Observer
effects: Cosmic Awareness regeneration increased by 100%
Become incorporeal at will, allowing passage through solid matter
Time flows differently around you, granting an additional action each turn

lore: Cosmic Seers represent the path of perfect neutrality among Fateweavers, transcending personal desires and moral judgments to observe the grand tapestry of fate with complete detachment. These enigmatic oracles have expanded their consciousness beyond normal limitations, perceiving the underlying patterns that govern all of reality. Unlike their good or evil counterparts, Cosmic Seers rarely intervene directly in events, preferring to maintain the delicate balance of the universe rather than push it toward any particular outcome. When they do act, it is usually to correct extreme imbalances that threaten the cosmic order itself. Their vast knowledge makes them invaluable advisors, though many find their counsel frustratingly neutral, as they present all possible futures without advocating for any particular path. Cosmic Seers often establish themselves in remote locations where they can observe the flow of destiny without distraction, though some travel the world as wandering sages, appearing at critical moments to ensure that fate unfolds as it should. They are both revered and feared for their seemingly limitless knowledge and their unwavering commitment to cosmic balance above all else.
